article.headline: Indiana 62, Michigan 53
article.story: BLOOMINGTON, Ind. (AP) -- Indiana's D.J. White and Bracey Wright each scored 16 points, and the Hoosiers took advantage of Michigan's sloppy ball-handling and poor second-half shooting to win its third straight, 62-53, Wednesday night. Indiana (8-7, 3-1) won for the sixth time in seven games and topped the .500 mark for the first time since Dec. 3. The Wolverines (12-6, 3-1) were led by Brent Petway, who came off the bench to score 12 points. But Michigan was plagued by 20 turnovers and made just 7 of 28 second-half shots as its six-game winning streak ended. Michigan has now lost seven straight to the Hoosiers. The second half was a stark contrast to the first half when Michigan overcame 11 turnovers by shooting 57.1 percent from the field. They couldn't duplicate that effort in the second half. After Indiana trailed 30-27 at halftime, the Hoosiers opened the second half on an 8-0 run to take a 35-30 lead. Michigan got within 40-39 with 10:29 left, but Indiana responded with a 9-0 spurt that forced Michigan to play catch-up the rest of the way. The Wolverines cut the lead to 54-51 when Daniel Horton completed a three-point play with 2:42 left, but Wright hit a 10-footer, Robert Vaden had a tip-in and the Hoosiers made 4 of 6 free throws in the final 40 seconds to seal the victory.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
